title: Introduction to Python Programming
content: This course is a beginner-friendly introduction to Python. It covers fundamental concepts such as variables, data types, loops, and functions. No prior programming experience is required. The course is ideal for those starting their journey in software development or data science.

title: Basics of Machine Learning
content: Our Machine Learning course introduces the foundational principles of ML. Students will learn about supervised vs. unsupervised learning, common algorithms like linear regression and k-means clustering, and how to evaluate model performance. A basic understanding of Python is recommended.

title: Web Development Fundamentals
content: Learn to build modern websites in our Web Development course. We cover the core technologies of the web: HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for interactivity. This course provides the building blocks for a career in front-end or full-stack development.

title: Introduction to SQL Databases
content: This course covers the fundamentals of SQL and relational databases. You will learn how to query data, create tables, and manage database schemas. Understanding SQL is a critical skill for back-end developers, data analysts, and anyone working with large datasets.
